choose.when: insert into category values ( null, #{name }, ( select ifnull( max( groupNo ), 0 ) + 1 from category c ), 1, 0)

mapper.select: select no, name, groupNo, groupSeq, depth from category order by groupNo asc, groupSeq asc
mapper.delete: delete from category where no = #{ no }

update.foreach: update category set groupSeq = "#{ vo.groupSeq }", depth = "#{ vo.depth }" where no = "#{ vo.no }"
